creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Needlework panel, black ground in gros point, foliated scrolls and arabesques in tans, greens, yellows, blues, and pinks - gros point. Human figures, birds and animals in petit point, also trees, sky and well-head in center cartouche, The ground of cartouche is green and yellow, outlined in pinks.
title: Needlework Panel
